title: 【翻译】Betweenlands官方wiki不完整翻译[InfStudio]
author: 时透无一年
txt_content:
本帖最后由 C似水流年 于 2016-9-17 11:16 编辑 


Betweenlands官方Wiki不完整翻译
简介
The Betweenlands is a mod developed by the Angry Pixel modding group for the indie sandbox construction game Minecraft. This large and expansive mod focuses on a whole new fully fleshed-out dimension for Minecraft that adds a plethora of exciting new content.

The Betweenlands dimension is a dark, swampy realm crawling with strange, monstrous creatures. It is the dimension that the majority of the mod revolves around.
Betweenlands是由Angry Pixel开发小组制作的沙盒游戏:Minecraft的Mod。该Mod专注于一个全新的次元，添加了许多激动人心的内容。
Betweenlands次元是一个黑暗的沼泽领域，遍布着许多奇怪的、怪物般的生物。
链接
官方Wiki：http://the-betweenlands.wikia.com/wiki/The_Betweenlands_Wiki
MCF原帖：http://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/mapping-and-modding/minecraft-mods/1441135
站内搬运：http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-603783-1-1.html

文档下载
百度云

后话
萌新求罩，目前时间问题只翻译了两个部分，合计5500字左右，后面会继续更新的。
我这个人比较懒，文档里没配图，下次补上...
如果支持的话请评个人气，你的评分是对我最好的支持。
